markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Waterfall](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2990)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living waterfalls are humanoid-shaped columns of churning water. They see the water as their natural domain and even aquatic animals as interlopers. When summoned, they are surly, but will grudgingly guard all forms of aquatic sites.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Living_Waterfall.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Living Waterfall](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2990)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=533" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 148 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Thalassic](/Languages.aspx?ID=113)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Waterbound** When not touching water, the living waterfall is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 90

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5

**Vortex** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732)) 30 feet. Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the living waterfall is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) for [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381)creatures that don't have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wave +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=47) or [Pull](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=71) 5 feet

**Drench** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The elemental puts out all fires in a 5-foot emanation. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) magical fires (+14 counteract modifier).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-412" />
name: Living Waterfall
